title: ap-2-unit_codes4
text: APPENDIX 2 : SU UNIT CODE NUMBERS (YÖK) B.30.2.SAB.0.00.00.01 President’s Office (Secretary’s Office) B.30.2.SAB.0.70.00.00 General Secretary’s Office B.30.2.SAB.0.70.73.00 Finance B.30.2.SAB.0.CE.00.00 Foundations Development B.30.2.SAB.0.CF.00.00 Engineering and Natural Sciences Programs B.30.2.SAB.0.CG.00.00 Arts and Social Sciences Programs B.30.2.SAB.0.E1.00.00 Social Sciences Institute (Management Programs) B.30.2.SAB.0.CH.00.00 Student Resources B.30.2.SAB.0.CI.00.00 Human Resources B.30.2.SAB.0.Cİ.00.00 Information Center B.30.2.SAB.0.CJ.00.00 Institutional Development B.30.2.SAB.0.CK.00.00 Information Technology B.30.2.SAB.0.CL.00.00 University Operations B.30.2.SAB.0.CO.00.00 Sabancı University Sakıp Sabancı Museum B.30.2.SAB.0.CÖ.00.00 Sabancı University Press NOTE: It is mandatory to use the above Unit Code Numbers in all correspondence to YÖK, ÖSYM, Ministries, University Presidents’ Offices and Government Offices. Reference numbers assigned by the units should be typed using forward slash ‘ / ’ as a separator. Eg.: B.30.2.SAB.0.70.00.00/99-00015
